content: My husband logged that he had covid but my phone didn't send out an alert to me, I checked the app and it was only a few hours later in the app it told me (although I of course knew). replyContent: The app uses Bluetooth to assess whether the users are in close physical proximity (2m or closer), for 15 mins or greater, in any single encounter. In cases where individuals are in the same household, if the devices do not meet the criteria, then no notification will be sent. The app solely relies on Bluetooth connectivity in order to assess risk.
